content:
CloudABI is now officially unmaintained: https://github.com/NuxiNL/cloudabi#note-this-project-is-unmaintained

NuxiNL/cloudabi
Definitions for the CloudABI data types and system calls - NuxiNL/cloudabi
For WASI, this means a few things:
Keeping the code WASI libc gets from cloudlibc in a roughly compatible structure in order to ease rebasing on upstream no longer makes sense, so we may start reorganizing more things now.
And, CloudABI mentions WASI as a new project inspired by CloudABI, and it's very true! We learned a lot and used a lot of code from CloudABI!
